sentences.sContent: His paintings had become more impressionistic as his eyesight dimmed.
sentences.sCn: 随着他的视力减弱，他的画变得越来越富有印象派风格。

synos.tran: 印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的

words.tran: 印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想
印象主义者；印象派作家
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象

trans.tranCn: 印象派的,给人深刻印象的
trans.tranOther: An impressionistic work of art or piece of writing shows the artist's or writer's impressions of something rather than giving clear details
